New Records: Moeen Ali scored 63 runs off 28 balls for the highest score of the match
Jason Roy scored 52 runs off 42 balls for the second-highest score of the match
Key Match Events: Moeen Ali took 2 wickets for 28 runs, and Jason Holder took 3 wickets for 44 runs in the match
Kieron Pollard scored 47 runs off 23 balls in partnership with Jason Holder, who scored 34 runs off 15 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Player of the Match is Moeen Ali
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies elected to bowl, and England chose to bat first
The match was played at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados
